mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_send(name, cn_name, auto_email, auto_message, email_content, message_content, en_message_content, send_2_consignor, send_2_recipient, modify_date) VALUES(#{name}, #{cnName}, #{autoEmail}, #{autoMessage}, #{emailContent}, #{messageContent}, #{enMessageContent}, #{send2Consignor}, #{send2Recipient}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_send SET name=#{name}, cn_name=#{cnName}, auto_email=#{autoEmail}, auto_message=#{autoMessage}, email_content=#{emailContent}, message_content=#{messageContent}, en_message_content=#{enMessageContent}, send_2_consignor=#{send2Consignor}, send_2_recipient=#{send2Recipient}, modify_date=#{modifyDate} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM auto_send WHERE name LIKE #{name} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
